title: Billie Jean
notes: Groove-based pop; archetypal mid-tempo hit.

title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
notes: Iconic 80s pop; very high-energy high-valence dance track.

title: When Doves Cry
notes: Sparse experimental but huge mainstream hit.

title: Take On Me
notes: Fast 80s synth-pop; perceived ~84.5 in half-time.

title: Everybody Wants to Rule the World
notes: Laid-back 80s pop-rock; mid energy mid danceability reflective tone.

title: Livin' on a Prayer
notes: Arena rock anthem; big chorus lift.

title: Sweet Child o' Mine
notes: Rock hit with iconic riff; long-form structure.

title: I Wanna Dance With Somebody (Who Loves Me)
notes: High-energy high-valence dance-pop.

title: Like a Prayer
notes: Gospel-infused pop; emotional but uplifting; album version used in benchmark.

title: Smells Like Teen Spirit
notes: Grunge rock anthem; very high energy with mid danceability and brooding anthemic tone.

title: Wonderwall
notes: Anthemic Britpop; strummy mid-energy.

title: Fantasy
notes: Mid-tempo R&B-pop; sweet upbeat feel.

title: Wannabe
notes: Bouncy girl-group pop; short hooky.

title: My Heart Will Go On
notes: Titanic power ballad; very slow big emotional build.

title: The Boy Is Mine
notes: Late-90s R&B-pop duet; mid tempo groove-based emotionally tense but not dark.

title: ...Baby One More Time
notes: Turn-of-era teen pop; strong hook mid-tempo.

title: I Want It That Way
notes: Boy-band ballad-ish pop; mid energy big chorus.

title: No Scrubs
notes: R&B-pop crossover; groove-led.

title: Yellow
notes: Alt-pop ballad; steady build emotional.

title: Crazy in Love
notes: Horn-driven R&B-pop; very high energy and danceability.

title: Hey Ya!
notes: Quirky funk-pop; very fast but feels infectious and fun.

title: Since U Been Gone
notes: Pop-rock belter; high energy breakup anthem.

title: Yeah!
notes: Club R&B; heavy low-end and high danceability.

title: Hips Don't Lie
notes: Latin-pop crossover; high groove and danceability; 2006 album version in benchmark.

title: Umbrella
notes: Dark mid-tempo R&B-pop; big chorus hook.

title: Poker Face
notes: Electro-pop banger; club-oriented energy.

title: I Gotta Feeling
notes: Huge party anthem; very high energy and danceability; feel-good chorus.

title: Rolling in the Deep
notes: Bluesy pop; strong vocal stomping groove.

title: Somebody That I Used to Know
notes: Sparse indie-pop ballad; mid energy but emotionally downbeat and melancholic.

title: Royals
notes: Minimalist alt-pop; very sparse low-band energy.

title: Uptown Funk
notes: Retro-funk pastiche; long but massive groove.

title: Happy
notes: Uptempo feel-good soul-pop; very high valence.

title: Shake It Off
notes: Maximalist pop; very high energy and valence.

title: Love Yourself
notes: Minimal acoustic pop; low energy and danceability with lightly snarky tone.

title: One Dance
notes: Afro-dancehall-inflected pop; mid energy very danceable moody but not dark.

title: Closer
notes: EDM-pop with mellow energy; streaming-era staple.

title: Believer
notes: Arena/pop rock anthem; very high energy with a strong but not club-focused groove, emotionally intense but ultimately uplifting.

title: Shape of You
notes: Caribbean-inflected pop; heavy on groove with mid valence.

artist: Luis Fonsi & Daddy Yankee feat. Justin Bieber
title: Despacito (Remix)
notes: Reggaeton-pop crossover; rhythmic sensual.

title: bad guy
notes: Minimal off-kilter pop; quirky cool rather than bright.

title: Don't Start Now
notes: Nu-disco pop; high-energy and very danceable.

title: Dynamite
notes: Disco-pop; very bright high-valence.

title: Levitating
notes: Another nu-disco cut; strong groove and fun tone.

title: Blinding Lights
notes: Feels like ~85.5 BPM double-time; retro synthwave pop.

title: Kiss Me More
notes: Playful disco-pop; high energy very danceable bright flirtatious tone.

title: drivers license
notes: Slow emotional ballad; breakup narrative.

title: Heat Waves
notes: Alt-pop slow-burn; hazy mid valence.

title: As It Was
notes: Feels like ~87 BPM double-time; bittersweet pop.

title: Flowers
notes: Mid-tempo self-empowerment pop; steady groove.

title: Ordinary
notes: Heartfelt 2025 summer ballad; moderate tempo, steady build, emotionally romantic but more intimate than euphoric.
